title: Themes nest in other library
description: Bug 134949Themes nest in other library Details:Themes nest in other libraryStep:1.
OB: When I open the Library tree of library A in the library explorer and try to drop themes from library B into the layout, an error message pops up saying that the library namespace 'B' already exists.
EB: Library A is using Library B, which contains a theme. The report design uses Library A. I open the Library tree of library A in the library explorer and try to drop the themes from library B into the layout.
SR: The error message indicates that the library namespace 'B' already exists. I'm unsure whether I can use this method to nest themes from one library into another.
